description: Try our easy to follow Sticky Date Pudding with Caramel Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sticky Date Pudding with Caramel Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp vanilla essence (save 1 tsp vanilla essence for sauce)
1.5 cup brown sugar (save 1 cup brown sugar for sauce)

recipeInstructions.text: Grease 6 x 1 cup capacity Texas muffin pans with butter and line bases with circles of baking paper.
Place dates and water into a small saucepan over a medium heat.
Reduce heat and simmer for 3 minutes or until liquid has almost evaporated.
Remove from heat and add bicarbonate of soda.
Cream butter, brown sugar and vanilla until light and creamy.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Using a large metal spoon, gently stir in flour and the date mixture.
Spoon mixture evenly into prepared pans.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until a skewer inserted into the centre comes out clean.
Allow to stand for 5 minutes before turning onto a wire rack.
Combine brown sugar, cream, vanilla and butter in a saucepan over a medium heat.
Cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until boiling.
